description:
The AudioMoth Time App is a simple tool for setting the onboard clock of your device.
	It will also display the unique ID, current battery level, firmware version and a brief description of the firmware installed on the attached AudioMoth.

**Please Note**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
summary: An Electron-based application capable of setting the on-board clock of the AudioMoth recording device.
author: OpenAcousticDevices
